Entries.ambient_Mine_RodneyOBrien~1: Look out {0}, behind you! A rock!
Entries.ambient_Mine_RodneyOBrien~3: I think something touched my leg...
Entries.ambient_Town_RodneyOBrien: Hey Pam! Oh no, that's a trashcan. Nevermind.
Entries.ambient_Desert_RodneyOBrien: It's so hot here, why do we even wear clothes?
Entries.ambient_SeedShop_RodneyOBrien: Pierre! One Joja Cola to go, please!
Entries.ambient_Saloon_RodneyOBrien: Hey Gus! How are you my friend?
Entries.ambient_Railroad_RodneyOBrien: I didn't even know there was something out there.
Entries.fight_RodneyOBrien: Think you can mess with the Rodney O'Brien?
Entries.fight_RodneyOBrien~2: Careful {0}, don't let them get to you!
Entries.fight_RodneyOBrien~4: DON'T YOU KNOW WHO I AM?!
